heading: Today
text: Clouds mixed with periods of sunshine. More clouds, a few snow showers in southwest VT.  Continued cold.  Highs from the low teens to low 20s north to south.  Winds west near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds.  Some snow showers in southwest VT.  Lows 5 below to 5 above zero north, near 10 above south.  Winds diminishing to less than 10 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Variable clouds and sunshine. Highs in the single numbers to low teens north, teens to low 20s south.  Winds becoming northwest near 10 mph, some gusts to 25 mph east of the Green Mountains.
